title: Frontend: Create ExercisePlanCard component for workout run
Backend: Add endpoint to get exercise schemes by user workout
Auto-select exercise scheme on workout edit
close_reason: Implemented auto-selection behavior for exercise schemes in workout edit route. When editing a workout, if exercise schemes exist for an exercise, the first one is auto-selected. If no schemes exist, 'Create New Scheme' is auto-selected with the form shown. This works in both deferred and immediate assignment modes. All tests pass.

title: Frontend: Create SetGoalRow component for individual set inputs
Exercise schemes not persisted/displayed after reload on workout detail route
description: After editing and saving exercise schemes on the workout edit page, the data appears to save successfully. However, after refreshing the page (F5), the exercise schemes are displayed as unconfigured on the user workout detail route. Need to verify: 1) Are schemes actually being persisted to the database? 2) Is the detail route correctly fetching and displaying the persisted schemes?

title: Remove configured scheme checkmark from workout detail
close_reason: Fixed: removed checkmark for configured schemes, now only showing warning when unconfigured
